meaningMnemonic: In <radical>winter</radical>, <radical>shellfish</radical> head in the <radical>direction</radical> of <radical>dirt</radical>, which is what makes them so <kanji>extravagant</kanji>.
readingMnemonic: One of the shellfish stands out to you as being extra <kanji>extravagant</kanji> because… it’s holding onto a German saber, a <reading>zei</reading>ber (ぜい)?!
